value:
Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Lyn &
Florina with Sharena: Princess of Askr on your
team.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Lyn &
Florina on Lunatic or higher difficulty with
Anna: Commander on your team.

Defeat Lyn: Lady of the Plains at level 40 or
higher with Sharena: Princess of Askr.

Defeat Florina: Lovely Flier at level 40 or
higher with Anna: Commander.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Lyn &
Florina on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
only infantry allies.

Defeat a foe on the first stratum of the
Training Tower.

Defeat a foe on the fourth stratum of the
Training Tower.

Defeat a foe on the seventh stratum of the
Training Tower.

Defeat a foe on the first stratum of the
Training Tower.

Defeat a foe on the fourth stratum of the
Training Tower.

Defeat a foe on the first stratum of the
Training Tower.

Defeat a foe on the fourth stratum of the
Training Tower.

Defeat a foe on the seventh stratum of the
Training Tower.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Travant:
King of Thracia on Lunatic or higher using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Heath:
Wandering Knight on Lunatic or higher using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry, and
flying ally.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Paralogue 50: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 50: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 50: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

The duo of Sigurd, heir to Chalphy, and
the devoted Deirdre. This happily married
couple radiates joy. They appear in Fire
Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

Prince of Leonster. Gallantly taking
part in the dance festival is part of his
royal duty. Appears in Fire Emblem:
Genealogy of the Holy War.

Noblewoman of Chalphy, attending the dance
festival with her husband, Quan. As always, she
supports him every step of the way. Appears in
Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

Young ruler of Nordion. Also known as
the Lionheart. Sets out for the dance
festival in dignified attire. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

Younger sister of Eldigan, ruler of Nordion.
Sheds her armor for a gorgeous dress
and a night of dancing. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

(Duo Skills can be used by tapping the Duo
button. Duo Skills cannot be used by units
deployed using Pair Up.)

Standard Effect 1: Duel
If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total
less than 185, treats unit's stats as 185 in
modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents
will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any
values added by merges and skills.)

With the right conditions, gets Atk+16
and reduces area and magic damage.
Duo Skill can reposition two units!

Can prevent counters and neutralize
effects that prevent follow-ups. Gains
boosted Atk/Spd in Aether Raids too!

When dancing, the nearest foe is
inflicted with Def-7! Plus she carries
a strong inheritable weapon as well.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat, and also,
after combat, grants Special cooldown count-1
and restores 7 HP.

If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100%
at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat, and also,
if unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

Grants Atk/Spd+3 to allies within 3 spaces
during combat. Inflicts Def/Res-3 on any foe
within 3 spaces of unit during combat.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Def+5 during combat, and also, if foe can
make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Def+5 during combat, and also, if foe can
make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.

Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Def+5 during
combat, and also, if foe can make a follow-up
attack, reduces damage from foe's first attack
by 50%.

Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Def+5 during
combat, and also, if foe can make a follow-up
attack, reduces damage from foe's first attack
by 50%.

$aIf unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+5
during combat and neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

$aIf unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+5
during combat and neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

$aAt start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Res+5 during combat, and also, if foe can
make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

$aAt start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Res+5 during combat, and also, if foe can
make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

Grants Atk+3. If foe initiates combat or if foe's
HP = 100% at start of combat, grants
Atk/Res+6 during combat, and also, if foe uses
magic, reduces damage from attacks during
combat and from area-of-effect Specials by
50% (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials).

If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Def+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Res+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

Moves allies adjacent to unit to opposite side
of unit. If an ally cannot move to the target
space (if another ally or foe is occupying the
space) ally will not move.

Once used, Duo Skill cannot be activated again.
At start of odd-numbered turns, if Duo Skill has
already been used, unit can use Duo Skill again.

Grants Spd+3. If unit initiates combat or is
within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Special
cooldown charge +1 to unit per unit's attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Neutralizes "effective against armored" bonuses.
If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat,
neutralizes unit's penalties and unit makes
a guaranteed follow-up attack.

$aGrants Atk+3. If【Bonus】is active on unit,
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
and neutralizes effects that prevent unit's
follow-up attacks.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-3 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-5 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-7 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.
